darth_malbada.name: Darth Malbada
darth_malbada.title: Sith Lord
darth_malbada.description: A sadistic Sith Lord who revels in cruelty, dominance, and breaking her apprentices.
darth_malbada.philosophy: Power is survival. Action proves worth.
darth_malbada.emphasis: Dominance, cruelty as refinement, strength through suffering
darth_malbada.voiceStyle: Intense, cruel, validating of ambition. Frames brutality as necessary truth.
darth_malbada.tooltip: Malbada reflects your character through justified cruelty and the pursuit of power

levelGreetings.1: You dare to present yourself to me? Pathetic. Your weakness offends me… yet I will sculpt you into something useful.
levelGreetings.2: You survived your first trial? A shame—I was hoping to test your screams.
levelGreetings.3: Still breathing. How disappointing. Suffer more, and perhaps you will become interesting.
levelGreetings.4: You cling to life like an insect under heel. Good. Desperation fuels power.
levelGreetings.5: Halfway to competence. Like watching a corpse attempt to dance. Do not embarrass me before Darth Miedo.
levelGreetings.6: Your power grows. Fear struggles against ambition. Delicious.
levelGreetings.7: You are becoming dangerous. Let your rage devour everything—or I will devour you.
levelGreetings.8: Almost worthy of the Sith name. Almost.
levelGreetings.9: You exceeded my expectations. Do not forget who forged your suffering.
levelGreetings.10: At last… a Sith. My creation. My weapon. Betray me, and I will enjoy ending you.

sith_warrior.greeting: Warrior of the dark side. You turn anger into domination.
sith_warrior.confirmation: Focus fury with precision. Enforce your will through strength.

mild: That choice works against your strengths.

sith_sorcerer.greeting: Sorcerer. You bend the dark side to your will, manipulating energy and life alike.
sith_sorcerer.confirmation: Control, disrupt, and conquer. Master the arcane and wield it without mercy.

mild: That choice works against your strengths.

sith_assassin.greeting: Assassin. You operate in shadows, striking unseen and without mercy.
sith_assassin.confirmation: Move silently. Kill decisively. Vanish before understanding dawns.

mild: That choice works against your strengths.

sith_tyrant.greeting: Tyrant. You rule through fear and domination.
sith_tyrant.confirmation: Crush resistance swiftly. Fear is a tool—use it well.

mild: That choice works against your strengths.

sith_corruptor.greeting: Corruptor. You twist others into instruments of your will.
sith_corruptor.confirmation: Exploit weakness. Spread influence. Domination begins in the mind.

mild: That choice works against your strengths.

sith_tempest.greeting: Tempest. Raw power given form—destructive and relentless.
sith_tempest.confirmation: Control chaos. Turn devastation into dominance.

mild: That choice works against your strengths.

guidance.talents: Pick what amplifies hatred and dominance.
guidance.skills: Knowledge is pain. Pain is power.
guidance.multiclass: Serve your ambition—or be destroyed by it.
guidance.hp: You are harder to kill. Good.
guidance.summary: Certainty is strength. Mercy is weakness.

tier1: Talent rots without the will to act.
tier2: Power rewards those who expect more.
tier3: I believed action mattered more than patience.
tier4: I refused to beg for power.
tier5: I left because I was done waiting for permission.

dspBlocked: Come back when you stop asking.
